messages.message: Hey Team, just working on a project to extract values from a document relating to auto-upgrades and the OCR text is showing the * symbol, however when extracting the field, the * symbol is not extracted on the IB side. @Hamish has helped with a custom function workaround, however would we be able to change this for future extractions?

Interestingly I tried using both cleaning prompts and chatGPT to write a custom function to fix the returned result and neither resulted in success (chatGPT code had errors and I don't have time to investigate properly)
My hunch is that LLMs don't process the * tokens well
just curious, what does your custom function do to work around this?
